name: Golem Network Platform
description: Learn the Golem platform on the official Golem Network website.

name: Golem Factory GitHub
description: Where you can find the open source code of all things Golem.

name: Yagna GitHub
description: The official Rust implementation of Golem.

name: Golem Community Chat
description: Join the community and team open discussion on Discord.

name: Reddit
description: Golem Network discussion on the Reddit platform.

name: Twitter
description: The Golem Project Twitter.

name: Blog
description: The official blog where you can find the most reliable information on announcements, summaries and updates.

name: About Thorg
description: Learn what the Thorg miner does.

name: Thorg Usage
description: Understand the depths of Thorg.

name: Twitter
description: The official Twitter of Thorg.

name: Golem Network Stats
description: Statistics tracking tasks and provider resource utilization in the Golem Network.

name: Golem Stats backend
description: Backend of the Golem Network Statistics page including API endpoint URLs.

name: Stats API Documentation
description: API endpoints that the Golem Network Stats page uses to display its data.

name: Golem SLATE
description: Hosted code pen SPA for writing a requester script to have work computed by the network. Utilizes dockerized yagna environments to communicate with the Golem Network in the background.

name: Chess On Golem
description: Hosted Chess app to play against the providers of the network utilizing the Stockfish open source Chess engine.

name: Go le' Machin
description: Web based bulk image editor that allows users to upload multiple images and apply bulk actions to them.

name: Golem Requestor Node
description: Dockerized requestor environment. Pass in the py script, it sets up the daemon and runs it.

name: Golem Test Harness (Goth)
description: Tool with the purpose of speeding up your development process and making it more enjoyable for application creators.

name: Golem-afl
description: An experimental test-fuzzing framework. Assists in finding security holes.

name: Golem Cargo Test
description: An adaptive distributed test executor for Rust projects.

name: Golem CI
description: Decentralized task pipeline.

name: Golem SLATE
description: Open source repository for Golem SLATE described in the above Apps section.

name: Yagna httpx client
description: VPN usage on Yagna demonstrating communication with a provider-based HTTP server the way you communicate with any other HTTP server.

name: Golem Provider with network access
description: A requstor that acts as a http proxy for running providers, allowing them to access the wider internet.

name: Golem Sudoku
description: Game of Sudoku with size variants.

name: HSOG-requester
description: Helps the HearthStone community in the design and building of decks by running a large number of simulated games.

name: ChessOnGolem
description: Open source repository for Chess described in first Apps section. Includes React frontend for the 2 AI's playing against each other through the Golem backend.

name: Golem Fleet Battle Simulator
description: System for calculating the results of a battle between two opposing starship fleets. Used in the iOS game Rock Paper Frigate to determine the result of PvP fleet battles.

name: Golem Completion Engine
description: Enhanced bash completion engine that extends built-in completions by providing contextual help for golemsp and yagna.

name: Golocity
description: Build and deploy your dockerized applications on the Golem Network in just two commands.

name: Golem Network Video Transcoder
description: Sample app to transcode videos. Select your transcoding profile and then upload your videos.

name: Golem Transcoding requestor
description: React + Spring based webapp accepting video files as input and transcoding these files into different formats.

name: Golem Auto Editor
description: Run Auto-Editor to automatically perform some video editing functions, offload the video processing to Golem.

name: Flan
description: Tool for entrepreneurs that provide customized analysis of millions of worldwide trade value records giving them a bold guideline about what sectors they would need to take more attention to.

name: Golem Lorenz-attractor
description: A system of three coupled, first-order, nonlinear differential equations which describe the trajectory of a particle through time.

name: Golem Geomandel
description: Python script for generating sequences of Mandelbrot images centered on a single point and with zoom increasing in each image.

name: Golem COVID
description: Creates images of new deaths per million related to COVID. After all images generated, it will gather them and create a gif.

name: Golem Parallel Matplotlib
description: Various statistical analyses are performed on circadian rhythm measurements in human test subjects.

name: Full-Text Search Engine
description: A search engine service that goes through text files.

name: cadCAD Golem
description: Package wrapper for cadCAD to dispatch the simulation workload to multiple Golem nodes. Supports Jupyter Notebook.

name: Golem Array
description: Antenna array design and simulation.

name: Limit visualization
description: Plots graphs with various limits. Supports discontinous graphs.

name: GolemGraphWavePair
description: Generates graph frames, then combine them into an animation.

name: Golemized strong-gravitational-lense
description: Simple distributed computing hack that simulates a physical phenomena called gravitional lensing.

name: Golem or-tools
description: Uses the or-tools Constraint Programming library to solve problems.

name: No more COFUD
description: Calculates how to fit the most people into a space while keeping 2 meters distance between each other.

name: Mutta Puffs
description: Sports league scheduler that solves the Travelling Tournament Problem for a given set of teams using Population-based Simulated Annealing.

name: ZKSync .csv export
description: Scrapes ZKSync to generate financial data in a .csv file.

name: DeML-Golem
description: Decentralised Machine Learning using Federated Learning to combine the sub-step models, it trains on different provider nodes into a full fleged model.

name: Golem Image Classifier
description: Train and classify images through an active service.

name: Mlg
description: CNN predict services, a deep learning application that distributes popular CNNs pre-trained with ImageNet datasets.

name: Deepart Golem
description: Makes art using distributed computing by running a tensorflow app, uploading your content and style picture.

name: Gandom
description: Extract random streams from providers. Supports two PRNGs, one based on Chaos machines and the other that makes use of Sodium.

name: Entropythief
description: Get random entropy at a steal of a rate from multiple providers utilizing the linux entropy source or Intel's RDRAND cpu instruction (inspired by Gandom).

name: Golem-JTR
description: Run John The Ripper to recover a password.

name: Yacat
description: Hashcat password-recovery step-by-step.

name: Golem Staking Pool incentivize system for GLM holders
description: A smart contract in order to provide the opportunity of yield farming for GLM token holders.

name: Magic-doll
description: Sumer is a DeFi application that people may delegate their Splinterland card to earn passive income. Its core is Kyle, a Golem app that does all the computation to pick the best team to play for each match.

name: Golem UI
description: Electron user interface for Yagna.

name: Gc__ListOffers
description: List offers by providers on the Golem Network with a GUI.

name: Gc__gvmi_hash
description: Recalculate the hash of gvmi image file. Solves the issue of having lost the hash of a previously uploaded image or if you're unsure if a key corresponds to a specific image.

name: gvm-vim
description: Golemized docker image for compiling the VIM editor.

name: YaJSapi fork with greeting example
description: Simple Node.js requestor app that greets you. It writes some important message to a file and then downloads it for you, the basic eskeleton of a requestor app. Look in examples/greetings.

name: Golem Image Sharpening
description: A tool to sharpen images.

name: Filterms
description: Market-strategy for whitelisting or blacklisting as a Golem requestor (yapapi).

name: golem-bulk-image-handler
description: Takes an input image and processes it in many different ways using the Pillow library.

name: GLM Rewards Program
description: A program that incentivizes activity within development, support, content creation, and more.

name: Gitcoin Bounties
description: A collection of open bounties and hackathons hosted on Gitcoin.

name: Yagna handbook
description: Handbook for the Golem, implementation name, Yagna.

name: Yagna Python API docs
description: Documentation for Yapapi.

name: Releases List
description: GitHub releases of Yagna.

name: Requestor flash tutorial
description: Get started quick and create your first tasks/request on Golem.

name: Yagna tag on Stack Overflow
description: Use the Yagna tag if you have an interesting question you'd like answered.

name: Breakdown of blender.js
description: JS guide for developers to get a better idea of how to run a task with the JavaScript API.

name: EasyYagnaJS
description: Copies over Node.js dependencies directly to the provider, making developers not have to use Docker in their workflow.

name: Provider Tutorial
description: Get started as a Provider on Golem Network using the handbook.

name: Provider FAQ
description: Community curated list of commonly asked questions and answers.

name: Yagna-binaries for aarch64
description: Build for 64 bit arm architecture to be able to run as a provider on a system such as a Raspberry Pi.

name: Automatically update provider node prices
description: Script that checks the median of the prices on stats.golem.network and updates all 3 values on the provider node related to price.

name: Golem Price Updater
description: Automatically adjust the price for your Golem node based on the current price of GLM.

name: Golem Provider dashboard
description: ReactJS dashboard made to quickly gather status from your provider nodes without havingn to SSH into them.

name: Golem Provider dashboard backend / GolemBar
description: Flask backend that collects the data from the provider that's then used with the dashboard project above.

name: Ansible ya_provider
description: Ansible role that deploys a Golem provider automatically with minimal configuration required.

name: WSL
description: Allows Windows users to run Golem within Windows Subsystem for Linux. Removing the requirement of Windows users needing to use a Virtual Machine.

name: Golem Provider Terraform
description: Terraform script to automatically deploy a Golem Provider on a cloud provider and setup monitoring using prometheus.

name: Automatic Golem
description: Setup a Golem Provider with simple instructions and logs guiding you through the process.

name: Golem Provider Node
description: Docker version of a node to help you get started running as a provider in a Docker container quick.

name: Golem Provider node
description: Fork of Alxexandre-abrioux project above that allows to dynamically generate config files from ENV variables and specify how many replicas you'd like to spawn.

name: Scaleable golem provider
description: Spawn x amount of providers using Docker.

name: Golem: Architecture, SDKs and tips with Jakub Mazurek at 0xHack
description: Live workshop diving into how any developer with Python or JS coding experience can start build applications running on Golem.

name: Golem: Growing an ecosystem the Golem way with María Paula Fernández at 0xHack
description: High-level overview and introduction to Golem as a project.

name: Golem Workshop at H3LLO Decentralization
description: List of resources containing a live-coding hackathon workshop and relevant resources to help developers understand and requesting on Golem.

name: Mainnet Requestor quickstart Walk-through
description: Video walk-through of the requestor quick-start handbook guide to get a request on Golem Network testnet and then mainnet using the Yagna Python API.

name: Mainnet Provider quickstart Walk-through
description: Video walk-through of the provider handbook guide to start sharing computational resources the Golem Network.

name: Unraveling Golem's The Next Milestone
description: Introduction to the Yagna implementation of Golem.

name: Unraveling Golem's The Next Milestone, Part II
description: Fundamental architectural concepts which constitute the foundations of the new implemenation of Golem, Yagna.

name: Unraveling Golem's The Next Milestone, Part III
description: The elements of Golem's reference architecture, and illustrates how they interact to form a working ecosystem, being the Golem Network.
